definition: "water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
rendering (computing)/to add washes of ink or color to a drawing (Chinese painting)/to exaggerate/to embellish

sentences.english: A systematic analysis on the approaches and procedures of the digital relief shading.
sentences.chinese: 系统阐述数字地貌晕渲的实现方法与技术步骤。

sentences.english: Illumination model is one of important factors which impact digital relief shading.
sentences.chinese: 光照模型是影响数字地貌晕渲的一个关键因素。

sentences.english: Shading is applied to the drawing by crayon or spray .
sentences.chinese: 晕渲是通过炭笔或喷射的方法应用于地图绘制的。

sentences.english: A systematic study on the supportive data of digital relief shading.
sentences.chinese: 对数字地貌晕渲实现的数据支撑进行了系统研究。

sentences.english: Shading is applied to the drawing by crayon or spray.
sentences.chinese: 晕渲是通过炭笔或喷射的方法应用于地图绘制的。

definition: (phonetic character used in transliteration of foreign names)/Taiwan pr. [li4]/variant of 璃[li2]
surname Mo/abbr. for 墨西哥[Mo4 xi1 ge1], Mexico
ink stick/China ink/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/corporal punishment consisting of tattooing characters on the victim's forehead
